meanings.definition: Characteristic of a heathen; pagan or irreligious.
meanings.sent1: The heathenish rituals involved dancing around a fire.
meanings.sent2: Her heathenish beliefs clashed with the teachings of the church.
meanings.sent3: The heathenish behavior of skipping school was not well-received by the principal.
meanings.sent4: His heathenish disregard for authority led to frequent conflicts.
meanings.sent5: The heathenish symbols painted on the walls were a sign of rebellion.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a heathen in behavior or belief.
meanings.sent1: The old house had a heathenish aura that made visitors uneasy.
meanings.sent2: The heathenish customs of the tribe fascinated anthropologists.
meanings.sent3: Her heathenish love for adventure often led to exciting escapades.
meanings.sent4: The heathenish music echoed through the forest, enchanting all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The heathenish attire of the festival attendees was a sight to behold.
